title: 818 finance
author: 818 finance
content: Welcome to 818.finance - Your reliable online cryptocurrency exchange! We understand that speed and security matter to you, which is why we offer dependable and instant cryptocurrency exchanges. Say goodbye to unnecessary delays and lengthy procedures - with us, everything is simple and swift!818.finance is the choice for those seeking an uncomplicated and secure way to exchange cryptocurrencies. Our team ensures the highest level of security to safeguard your personal information and funds at every stage of the exchange. We comprehend the value of your time, so we strive to provide swift exchanges.Our exchange supports a wide variety of cryptocurrencies, including popular assets like USDT, BTC, ETH, LTC, DOGE, and more. We consistently update the list of supported cryptocurrencies to meet all your needs.Currently, we are listed on the following monitors:1. obmify2. kurs.expert3. bits.media4. kurs.com.ua5. bitcoinmarket.global6. okchanger7. scanbitForget about risks and insufficient support - at 818.finance, we're always available, ready to offer professional assistance and address all your inquiries.Contact:exchange@818.financehttps://telegram.me/f818_supporthttps://www.818.finance/

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: "818.finance" that domain name gives me some sinister feelsI suggest you should add more language translations to your platform, like English, since you decided to post in the English board.Also, you don't feature in a number of platforms listed on your home page like exchangesumo.com or glazok.org. What's the point of displaying their banners on your site?

comments.author: 818 finance
comments.body: These are the requirements of these monitorings, we are forced to place their logos while our application is being considered. English will be added soon. Thank you!
